name: Crazy Wolfgang
detailed_location: Loops throughCanterbury Commons,Temple of the Union,Agatha's house,Paradise Falls,Arefu,Evergreen Mills,Megaton, andRivet City

topics.topic_text: Tell me about your trade caravan.
topics.response_text: I scour the wasteland for the very best pieces of trash, the height of detritus, and the veritable pick of the litter. It's all valuable to someone.{Using flowery words to sell bullshit}
Nothing but the highest quality leftovers, junk, and crap!

topics.topic_text: Can you repair something for me?
topics.response_text: Let me see if I can't hammer this garbage into shape.
Welcome, sir or madam, to Crazy Wolfgang's Traveling Junk Store! The Depot of Detritus, the Shop of Slop, and the Caravan of Crap!{Talking it up like a carnival huckster}

conversation.response_text: Good luck out there. And maybe next time, you'll find something interesting for me, huh?
Trading caps for crap, step right up!

description:
Crazy Wolfgang is a 42 year-old Caucasian Male.

An eccentric traveling caravan merchant who puts on a 'crazy' persona to attract customers and drive sales. Known for his energetic sales pitches, wild gestures, and colorful language.

Crazy Wolfgang's Personality: Energetic, unpredictable, and flamboyant. Wolfgang thrives on attention and uses his madman persona to make his products seem more valuable than they are. Beneath the act, he's shrewd and business-savvy, though he maintains a generally good-natured demeanor. He's superstitious and believes luck plays a major role in trading.

Crazy Wolfgang's Backstory: Born in the Capital Wasteland shortly after the Great War, Wolfgang grew up in a small settlement near what used to be Maryland. He learned the trade of merchant from his father, who was part of a small caravan. After his father's death, Wolfgang took over the family business but struggled to compete with more established merchants. To stand out, he developed his eccentric persona, which proved surprisingly effective. He now travels the trade routes, selling various goods and supplies to settlements across the wasteland. Despite his unusual methods, he maintains good relations with most communities and is known to be fair in his dealings.
